protocol_name: Th2 Polarization of Mouse CD4+ Cells

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ll45","text":"Harvest lymph nodes (superficial cervical, mandibular, axillary, inguinal, and mesenteric) from mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"F3913E1740A24FC78DF662160FE7CAF6","id":664753,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"fko6g","text":"Tease lymph nodes through a sterile 70-\u00b5m nylon cell strainer to obtain single-cell suspensions in complete RPMI containing 10% FCS (complete medium).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"49C1B05F9A7743DCB3886BC5CA9656D2","id":664754,"previous_id":664753,"previous_guid":"F3913E1740A24FC78DF662160FE7CAF6","section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j9eg","text":"Resuspend cells in complete medium and use your favorite method to isolate CD4+cells. Consider using our Mojosort\u2122 Mouse CD4 T Cell Isolation Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":78,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":105,"length":41,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":105,"length":41,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/www.biolegend.com\/mojosort-mouse-cd4-t-cell-isolation-kit-11870.html"}}],"guid":"5CFDCD0684EE4769A950D503760078E8","id":664755,"previous_id":664754,"previous_guid":"49C1B05F9A7743DCB3886BC5CA9656D2","section":"Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes"}
steps.section: Isolation of CD4+ Cells From Lymph Nodes

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"8d2jg","text":"On day 0, plate CD4+cells at 30 x106\/30 ml\/T-75 flask. Culture cells for 3 days in complete RPMI containing 10% FCS, Con A (5\u00b5g\/mL), recombinant mouse IL-2 (20ng\/ml), and recombinant mouse IL-4 (50ng\/ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":19,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":35,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D9C3C131F3F045C2B52D962ADC68BC96","id":664757,"previous_id":664756,"previous_guid":"5CFDCD0684EE4769A950D503760078E8","section":"Th2 Polarization of CD4+ Cells"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cvqk","text":"On day 3, harvest the cells and wash cells once. Seed 15 x106cells\/30 ml\/T-75 flask along with recombinant mouse IL-2 (20ng\/ml) and recombinant mouse IL-4 (50ng\/ml).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":60,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"4DCA1CCB579A4E738B7687694A5D5CE1","id":664758,"previous_id":664757,"previous_guid":"D9C3C131F3F045C2B52D962ADC68BC96","section":"Th2 Polarization of CD4+ Cells"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8aqs","text":"On day 5, coat a 60 x 15 mm tissue culture petri dish with anti-mouse CD3\u03b5, clone 145-2C11, 10\u00b5g\/mL in PBS, 5ml\/dish. Incubate in a 4\u00b0C refrigerator overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E1F572F115664F51BBB87409996CB468","id":664760,"previous_id":664759,"previous_guid":"4DCA1CCB579A4E738B7687694A5D5CE1","section":"Th2 Polarization of CD4+ Cells"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h9b9","text":"On day 6, wash the anti-mouse CD3\u03b5 pre-coated tissue culture petri dish with PBS. Harvest the cells from the flask (that were seeded on Day 5), wash them twice, and seed at 20 x106\/10 ml\/petri dish along with 10\u00b5l of monensin (1000x) and anti-mouse CD28, clone 37.51 (5\u00b5g\/ml). Incubate for 6 hours at 37\u00b0C in a CO2incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":179,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":313,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5cjbg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"sc8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"4A5A5CC0B85F11E892A397437170956C","duration":21600,"label":"","step_guid":"38D1EE3657864CB89BC61C4C3C10BBD9"}}],"guid":"38D1EE3657864CB89BC61C4C3C10BBD9","id":664761,"previous_id":664760,"previous_guid":"E1F572F115664F51BBB87409996CB468","section":"Th2 Polarization of CD4+ Cells"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ko87","text":"After harvesting, the cells are ready for staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"565A2964114446C4B8ABDBF813D1C3DD","id":664767,"previous_id":664766,"previous_guid":"38D1EE3657864CB89BC61C4C3C10BBD9","section":"Th2 Polarization of CD4+ Cells"}
